name: DEET-Free Insect Repellent with Picaridin, The 12 Hour Protection, DEET Alternative - Citrus + Sandalwood
short_description: 12-HOUR MOSQUITO & TICK PROTECTION: Long-lasting defense against mosquitoes and ticks, including those that may transmit West Nile, Dengue and Lyme disease.
8-HOUR MULTI-INSECT COVERAGE: Shields for up to 8 hours against biting flies, gnats, chiggers, and sand flies for reliable, all-day outdoor protection.
20% PICARIDIN FORMULA: Powerful DEET alternative derived from natural sources—effective, gentle, and suitable for sensitive skin without harsh chemicals.
LIGHTWEIGHT, QUICK-DRYING & NON-STAINING: Water-based formula absorbs fast, feels clean and non-greasy, and won’t stain clothing or gear—perfect for face and body.
CITRUS + SANDALWOOD SCENT: Enjoy a vibrant, refreshing fragrance that quickly fades, leaving no lingering odor for a comfortable, scent-free experience.

name: Deet-Free Insect & Mosquito Repellent Pack of 2 (8 oz) – Nice Smelling Insect Repellent with Lemongrass Oil Safe for Pets and Kids – Bug Spray for Mosquitoes, Gnats, Black Flies, and No-See-ums
short_description: DEET FREE BUG SPRAY – Unlike DEET bug sprays, Medella protects you from gnats, black flies, no-see-ums, and mosquitoes using lemongrass essential oil. Our insect repellent spray is also grass-safe.

NICE-SMELLING INSECT SPRAY – Medella Mosquito Spray has a great-smelling scent that you will love – it smells like lemongrass with a hint of vanilla scent. It also does not leave an annoying, sticky residue after spraying it on the skin.

PET AND KID-SAFE – Our outdoor bug spray is safe to use on pets and kids when used as directed. It’s the ultimate repellent for mosquitoes and insects that you can use so the whole family can enjoy the outdoors.

PROVEN TO WORK – Protect yourself from insects with a study-backed product. In a study done by the University of Georgia’s Black Fly Rearing and Bioassay Laboratory, our bug spray repelled 90% of black flies and gnats up to 5.5 hours after application.

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY – Medella Insect & Mosquito Repellent comes in 3 convenient sizes – 2oz, 4oz, and 8oz. Our insect spray, especially the 2-oz size, can easily fit golf bags, tackle boxes, backpacks, and more.

This odorless mosquito repellent feels good on skin and is not oily, sticky or greasy. It's formulated with picaridin to provide up to 6 hours of effective protection* from mosquitoes and to repel mosquitoes that may carry West Nile Virus. The easy-to-apply spritz spray makes it simple to spray and go. OFF! outdoor bug spray for kids and adults is suitable for children ages 1 year and up**. *when used as directed * *For kids between 1 and 10 years, only apply 2 times per day.

name: Repel Plant-Based Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent, 4 Ounces, DEET-Free Pump Insect Repellent Repels Mosquitoes For 6 Hours With Plant-Based Ingredients, 2 Pack
short_description: REPELS MOSQUITOES: Repels mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses.
DEET-FREE* FORMULA: This product harnesses the power of Oil of Lemon Eucalyptus.
PROTECTS FOR UP TO 6 HOURS: This repellent keeps you and your family protected for hours, so the outdoor fun doesn't have to end. Not to be used on children under 3 years.
REFRESHING SCENT: This DEET-free* personal repellent leaves you with a cool, refreshing scent so you don't have to put up with the “usual bug spray” smell.
NOT GREASY OR STICKY: Provides protection without leaving your skin feeling sticky or greasy.
product_description: Outdoor enthusiasts know that when the going gets tough, so should their insect repellent. However extreme the activity or terrain, there's a Repel insect repellent designed to offer dependable coverage that lasts as long as you need it to. Repel products make effective mosquito protection simple under any circumstance—so you can heed the call of the wild wherever the trail takes you. DEET-free Repel Plant-Based Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent provides protection for a range of activities, from your backyard to your travel destinations. Find a bug spray that fits your needs and enjoy protection that lasts for hours. This formula is made with oil of lemon eucalyptus, a plant-based ingredient that is recommended by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. This insect repellent won't leave you greasy or sticky, making it a great spray-and-go option for busy weekends. Repel mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses without the DEET. If you’re looking for a DEET-free alternative to create a mosquito barrier, then oil of lemon eucalyptus is a great option. Derived from the leaves of the Eucalyptus citriodora tree, oil of lemon eucalyptus repels mosquitoes for up to six hours. You can use oil of lemon eucalyptus-based products on children 3 years and older.

DURABLE PROTECTION FOR CAMPING & HIKING: Reapply after heavy sweating for nonstop coverage. This organic mosquito repellent, infused with lemongrass and citronella, keeps you protected through long trails, fishing trips, or early-morning hunts.

DEET FREE INSECT REPELLENT: The light, fresh aroma and USDA Organic formula is free from DEET, alcohol, and synthetic fragrance, providing safe, skin-friendly protection wherever adventure takes you. Great mosquito spray for the entire family.

short_description: EFFECTIVE, DEET-FREE FORMULA: Our award-winning Natural Bug Spray harnesses the power of citronella and lemongrass essential oils which smell lovely to humans but effectively repel annoying mosquitoes and insects. Repellency is based on scent, reapply every 30 minutes.!
SAFE FOR BABIES 6 MONTHS AND OLDER: We only use essential oils to repel bugs - no harsh chemicals. This DEET-free formula is safe for babies over 6 months. Safe for head-to-toe use.

BEAUTIFUL CITRONELLA AND LEMONGRASS SCENT: Most bug sprays have a toxic, cough inducing scent. Our Bug Spray for kids harnesses the power of citronella, lemongrass, and cedar pure essential oils for a scent that smells beautiful and also effectively repels bugs.

STRICTLY ALLERGY TESTED: Our Baby Bug Spray is free of common allergens like gluten, soy, sesame, oat, dairy, peanuts, and tree nuts (except coconut). No risk of cross-contamination with those allergens.

TRUSTED SINCE 1995: California Baby was developed by a mother over 28 years ago. All products are blended & manufactured in California Baby’s own FDA Registered manufacturing facility in Los Angeles. California Baby is proudly family owned & operated.

short_description: The Repel pump spray repellent protects up to 10 hours
Repels mosquitoes that may transmit the Chikungunya, Zika, Dengue and West Nile viruses
Formulated for severe insect conditions
Flip-top cap prevents accidental spraying when not in use.
TRAVEL-SIZE PUMP SPRAY: This 1-ounce, flip-cap bottle is perfect for outdoor travel – the compact size stores perfectly with whatever adventure gear you're taking that day
product_description: Outdoor enthusiasts know that when the going gets tough, so should their insect repellent. However extreme the activity or terrain, there's a Repel insect repellent designed to offer dependable coverage that lasts as long as you need it to. Repel products make effective mosquito protection simple under any circumstance—so you can heed the call of the wild wherever the trail takes you.Repel 100 Insect Repellent provides you with up to 10 hours of protection. Spending a long time outdoors can be refreshing, but mosquitoes can bring that to a halt. This convenient 1 ounce travel-size pump spray can be easily stored with whatever gear your adventure requires. Formulated for severe insect conditions, Repel 100 Insect Repellent contains 98.11% DEET. Repel mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses, as well as ticks, gnats, biting flies, chiggers and fleas. Extreme conditions call for strong protection. Make Repel 100 Insect Repellent your bug spray essential.DEET has been used as an insect repellent in the United States for more than 50 years. It’s recommended for those spending longer periods of time outdoors, in more heavily infested conditions. Recommended by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for effective, long-lasting protection against mosquitoes, DEET is also an effective repellent for ticks. DEET-based products are available in a wide variety of Repel formulas, including aerosols, sprays and wipes.
